title: Cargoes
brief_description: The “Ionian” (a cargo ship) leaves London at the end of July 1939 to deliver cargo to the British owned ports in the Mediterranean area such as Malta and Cyprus, passing on the way many of the British naval ships as they prepare for the second World War a month later. No other credits available.
